captions.text: - Well, hello everyone!
My name is Tyler Oakley and I feel like

it has been forever since I
have been in this apartment.

I have been traveling
all around the country
and all around the world doing some stuff,

some secret projects, some
fun little appearances.
Things like that. It has been a busy time.

But now that I am back
here in my apartment,
I was like, "You know what?"

There is nothing that I
would rather do than to film

(clap)
a Q

(clap)
and slay.

(clap)
That's not how it goes.

It's time to-- wait, no,
that's my (laughs)...

It's time
(clap)

for another
(clap)

Q
(clap)

and slay.
(clap)

How many nipples do you
find attractive on a donkey?

Good question. I would
like all the nipples.
(soft Caribbean music)
Megan would like to know was the Grammy
at the house party real?
Yes. So I was at a house party last night
and I found a Grammy (laughs).

Also, at that house party
there was a bookcase

where you push it and it
opened up into a secret room.
This was not a real house, actually.
The more that I think about it,
the less I believe that it was real.

There was also a kumquat
bush out in the backyard.

Everything that I'm
saying does not seem real

but I promise you, these
are things that happened:

kumquat bush, secret
bookshelf room, and a Grammy.
Believe it.

Becca says your Tweet,
"Virginia, I am in you,"
was easily misread.
You're not actually straight now, are you?

I, actually, just went to
Virginia to do a speaking gig

and, as you guys know, if
you follow me on Twitter,

I like to keep you guys
abreast to where I am

in the world by Tweeting,
"Blank, I am in you."

So obviously, I Tweeted,
"Virginia, I am in you."
And everyone was like, "Oh, my God!
"You went back in the womb!"
And I'm like, "No, I didn't."
I do not have womb withdrawal.

I am not looking to go
back into my mother,

nor any vagina, no
offense to all the people
out there who have vaginas.
I'm not looking to be in you.

Who would I date out of
all the Disney princes?
Obviously, Aladdin, I am very into men
who are passionate about carbs.
If Aladdin is willing to go to jail
in order to get me bread, sign me up.

Jadelyn would like to know
what is your favorite snack
off of NatureBox this month?

As you guys know, I am
traveling all the time.

So I try to steer clear
of unhealthy hotel foods,

or airplane foods, and
my solution is NatureBox.
And this month I am giving you guys a deal
if you use NatureBox.com/Tyler,
you get a free box of samples.

But this month, I am recommending
the Apple Cinnamon Crave.

It's like a big old mix
of peanuts and almonds
and cinnamon and apples.
And it's delicious, I absolutely love it.
So this is what I'm loving this month.

But if you go to the
website, you, basically,
pick out whatever snacks you want,
they send them to your front door.
It's the best thing in the world.
You don't have to deal with humans.

You can get a small box,
medium box, large box,
whatever you would like.
It's kind of the best thing in the world.

The foods are all healthy,
which I am looking for
because daddy is trying to get in shape.
Which means, they are low in transfats

and sometimes gluten free,
so if you are looking
for stuff like that, NatureBox.com/Tyler
and you can get a free box of samples
just for using that link.

It's that simple, who
wouldn't want free food?
You're welcome in advance.

Taylor says how many copies
of the Seventeen Magazine
that you're in do you own?
I only own one.

As you can see, Bethany
Mota is on the cover

and then it's got a
whole bunch of YouTubers.

So a few months ago I went
to a top-secret photo shoot

with a whole bunch of my YouTube
friends and this happened.

But, yeah, while we were
all there hanging out
and seeing each other's photo shoots,
which was surreal to begin with,
we also go to do a bunch of interviews.

So if you want to see
the video of my interview
you can click right there.
But, yes, if you want to get a copy,
it is available everywhere.

I see it at airports,
I see it at bookstores,
I see it at convenience stores.
Pick up a copy, support #teaminternet
and just sayin', you might see me inside.

Bean would like to know
how was presenting an award
at the GLAAD awards with Hannah?
Bean, hello? It was really great.

Me and Hannah got to
present an award to Google
and YouTube for all of their work
that they do for the LGBT community
and to thank them for giving a platform

to people just like us,
so that we can connect.

Yeah, it was really cool,
it was really surreal.
I took a selfie with Taryn Manning
from Orange is the New Black.

Very normal.
Seriously, Tyler,

which member of 5 Seconds
of Summer would you bang
and you can only pick one?
I'm sorry, boys, Calum, it's me and you,
consensually, let's make it happen,

only if you want and until
then let's just be friends
because being friends is enough for me.

If you could, would
you ever take a younger

and less successful YouTuber
under your wing to perspire?

Yes, I would, we would
do all the activities.

Anything that I could do to
help them sweat it all out.
Always looking out for small Tubers,

even if it means helping
them sweat, why not?
How do I stop the YouTube thing?
Um, I don't know, close your laptop.
Someone you haven't collaborated with
but really, really want to?

I would have to go with
Oprah, or maybe Beyonce,

or Lady Gaga, yeah, that's
a good starter list.

Na Ya would like to know if
your vacuum cleaner sucks,
is that a bad thing?

(sighs) I just-- I feel like
you just fucked me up real bad.
Na Ya, why you gotta do this to me?

But that is all I have
for you guys this week.
I hope you like this video.

If you did, be sure to
give it a thumbs up.
And it does nothing for YouTubers

but it just lets us know
that you liked this video

and it would mean a lot
to me if you did that.

And if you want to see my
latest video, it's right there.

If you want to see my monthly
favorites, it's right there.

If you want to hear my
latest podcast with Corey,
it's right there.
This one is the funniest episode yet.
I'm just putting it out there.

Listen to it, love it,
subscribe on iTunes.

And if you want to be
my person of the week,

all you gotta do is go to
districtlines.com/TylerOakley,

get something real cute,
Tweet me a picture,
and you might be right there.

Subscribe because we're
getting weirdly close
to six million subscribers.

I love you guys, I will
see you guys next time
and until then, have a good life. Bye!
I also just want to show you this mug.

It's from Emma, it says, "I
love you, Tyler, love Emma."
But I don't know Emma who?

Or they didn't include
their Twitter handle
or anything like that.
But I just wanted to give you some love.
Thank you, Emma, I love this mug.

title: Stealing A Stranger's Grammy (#AskTyler #28) | Tyler Oakley
